text: Sankt Blasien or St. Blasien is a town in Waldshut in Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany. It is in the Southern Black Forest. The benedictine abbey of St. Blaise is in Sankt Blasien, which was first mentioned in 858. == Twin towns == Sankt Blasien is twinned with: * Klingnau, Switzerland * Saint-Blaise, Switzerland * Sankt Paul im Lavanttal, Austria == References == Category:Waldshut (district)
title: Sankt Blasien
